quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
author: Al McGuire

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow internet to see who they really are.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Anonymous

quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
author: Steve Martin

quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
author: A.A. Milne
